sourcesContent:
import { HamburgerIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons";
import {
  Avatar,
  Box,
  Flex,
  IconButton,
  Drawer,
  DrawerBody,
  DrawerFooter,
  DrawerHeader,
  DrawerOverlay,
  DrawerContent,
  DrawerCloseButton,
  useDisclosure,
  Input,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";

const Header = () => {
  const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure();

  return (
    <>
      <Flex
        w="100%"
        h="60px"
        bg="tomato"
        align="center"
        justify="space-between"
        px={4}
      >
        <IconButton
          bg="none"
          aria-label="Menu"
          icon={<HamburgerIcon w="25px" h="25px" />}
        />

        <Avatar size="sm" />
      </Flex>

      <Drawer isOpen={isOpen} placement="right" onClose={onClose}>
        <DrawerOverlay>
          <DrawerContent>
            <DrawerCloseButton />
            <DrawerHeader>Create your account</DrawerHeader>

            <DrawerBody>
              <Input placeholder="Type here..." />
            </DrawerBody>
          </DrawerContent>
        </DrawerOverlay>
      </Drawer>
    </>
  );
};

export default Header;
